name: Temple of Otu
description:
Temple of Otu is a single-player puzzle adventure set in a mysterious… temple. Yes, a mysterious temple. The Temple of Otu, in fact. Legend has it that the Temple of Otu is the lost resting place of the Ankh, the fabled Key of Life. Countless adventurers have sought its treasure, but only half-crazed rumors of a living temple have returned. 

The game is designed to challenge the ideas that players have about the disposable nature of adventures, their motivations for undertaking them, and the ways in which we assume they’ll turn out. 

One choice may hold the key to life itself, or it may turn out to be a very bad day for everyone involved. 

Find out, in the Temple of Otu!

Created by:

Game Development - shammi seth

Programmer - Pixel Lifetime

Level Designer - jdanielx

Narrative - Ryan Stump (RTStump)

Music and Sound Design - Grant Holzhauer (dojogrant)

Voiceovers - Cassy and Ava Holzhauer

**Original sound effects sampled from freesound.org under the Creative Commons 0 License.
